name: Molecular Warfare 2 - 2D Free TDS
description:
Molecualr Warfare 2 is a sequel to MW1. With beautiful graphics.

Molecualr Warfare 2 - includes interesting battles with different weapons, many maps and modes.

The world has plunged into a global war against terrorists using nuclear weapons. After the war, a huge number of countries and people were wiped off the face of the earth. Your Molecular squad has come out to help the world to stop the remnants of the Powder terrorists.

The game has various modes: document search, survival, boss battle. And also a large number of weapons: pistols, machine guns and submachine guns.

Sys Req: Android 6.0+, 1Gb RAM
